q: year By Jeff McLane INQUIRER STAFF WRITER DALLAS- The NFL threw Michael Vick a party and named the Eagles quarterback comeback player of the year, capping off an improbable season. I thank my coaches and my teammates, said Michael Vick , who was on hand to accept his award. "They got me better as an NFL player, as a quarterback, and took advantage of my talents." said Mike Pence has no plans to attend CPAC this year and has no comment about the GOProud controversy. "At this time the congressman is focusing his attention on Indiana," Lloyd said. He hopes to participate in future CPAC opportunities as his schedule permits. The American Conservative Union, which started the conference, raised eyebrows among conservatives last year when it first allowed GOProud to be a co-sponsor. Those concerns have grown this year.

will be the next speaker in the World Within Reach Speaker Series, which has also featured Colin Powell , Karl Rove , Howard Dean , and most recently, Barbara Walters . The Speaker Series is an initiative by the SA to bring engaging speakers in public affairs, entertainment, and business to the University at Albany to gain insight from their unique perspective. So far all speakers have had a political background, with the exception of Barbara Walters , a journalist.
